alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Franklin; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 9:28PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Franklin, eastern Phelps, Kearney, southern Buffalo, southeastern Dawson and northeastern Harlan Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 927 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hildreth, or 18 miles southeast of Holdrege, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Axtell and Funk around 945 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Kearney, Odessa, Riverdale and Amherst. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 255 and 284. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Dawson; Franklin; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps
